feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add sentry report wrapper to every api route in appDir by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19966
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19992
  • fix: importing from @calcom/emails exposed daily-video api route to client code by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19994

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.17...v5.0.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: push notification page UI by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19999
  • fix: add improved logging and decrease ttl by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19979
  • fix: avatar sentry errors by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20005
  • fix: remove Trans component by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20008
  • refactor: v2 booking locations by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19613
  • fix: fixes extra span causing issues in seated event display by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20004
  • docs: v2 reschedule and cancel booking by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20011
  • fix: api-v2 libraries/app-store missing tsconfig by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20006
  • chore: add CalendarService Exception Filter api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20021
  • fix: round robin locale err by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20024
  • fix: no-meeting-found is exporting client component from RSC by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20027
  • chore: remove campsite from app store by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20032
  • fix: hide slot unavailable message for instant meetings by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20002
  • feat: Fetch previous ooo records using DateRangeFilter by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19596
  • fix: disable plain for self hosters by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19853
  • fix: Disable connected forms for any new form or route until further notice by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20040
  • feat: Organization onboarding improvement - Payment before creation of org but onboarding doesn't require payment by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18990
  • fix: Enable feature for embeds when 100 pc is set by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20003
  • fix: apply standard pagination to /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19973
  • fix: circular dependency in handleNewBooking by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19890
  • fix: Intercom app - regex valid url by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20033
  • fix: reset page on filter change and remove client-side filtering by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20043
  • feat: store cal video recording on s3 by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17050
  • fix: add conditional by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20057
  • perf: Ignore node_modules in Tailwind preset by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20058
  • fix: add booking uid and link to insights routing downloads by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20007
  • feat: don't update query params for booker atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20000
  • fix: Do not self import @calcom/ui by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20050
  • fix: support more className-related props at DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19953

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.18...v5.0.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20074
  • fix: client export warning by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20077
  • fix: flaky test in ooo e2e by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20073
  • fix: synced no-show state after mutation by @parteekmalik in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20015
  • fix: delegation credential not found by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20055
  • perf: fix paths in tailwind preset + ignore node modules in Platform tailwind config by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20067
  • docs: v2 set cal-api-version header automatically by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20042
  • fix: Build completed with no type errors by @Sarvesh804 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20075
  • fix: invitati instead of inviati by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20085
  • chore: handle conferencing callback missing state error by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20081
  • feat: v2 bookings createdAt filter by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20054
  • feat: add utm tracking on booking by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19965
  • fix: incorrect managed user username format on update by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20090
  • perf: Use built types for appRouter by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20083
  • fix: schedule.get is unnecessarily called from the schedule ListItem by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20094

New Contributors

  • @parteekmalik made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20015
  • @Sarvesh804 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20075

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.19...v5.0.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: German translation for seats_availability text by @ajayjha1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20086
  • chore: Bump typescript version in @calcom/ui by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19766

New Contributors

  • @ajayjha1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20086

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.20...v5.1.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Use Watchlist on sending email verifications by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20114
  • perf: Slim down loggedInViewer tRPC router by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20111
  • fix: atoms making requests to customers' domains by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20084
  • perf: Remove slots router from publicViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20128
  • perf: Move apps procedures off of loggedInViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20112
  • refactor: Delete dead code that is not safe to use by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20141
  • chore: stringify body for request interceptor/middleware by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20131
  • fix: Salesforce Stricter Website querying to prevent wrong account match during contact owner check by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20133
  • fix: don't remind platform users in reminder cron by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20056
  • chore: create org membership should be an upsert apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20129
  • fix: Salesforce - fallback to creating lead by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20137
  • feat: v2 api phone based organization team event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20134
  • fix: UID cookie isn't accessible/created when in embed as it is third party context. by @gopoto in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859
  • test: Add tests for Booker component by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19051
  • fix: prevent auto accepting emails for platform orgs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20125
  • fix: flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20168
  • fix: spacing by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20172
  • chore: Add logging to Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20167
  • fix: sms formatting by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18647
  • perf: Remove QueryCell usage in availability view by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20176
  • fix: eslint error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20127
  • fix: add documentation to the possible values of :app in conferencing controller by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20164

New Contributors

  • @gopoto made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.0...v5.1.1
